text: U hecwekiya wane file hene! Weki hecwekiya wi sivane tarisan, ku di gava qire tarisan dike, taris ji pestire deng tu tisti ji wi sivani nabihe (evan filan ji ji pexemberan hey deng dibehen tu arsan, ji gazi kirina wan nabihen. Ewan filan) ker in u lal in u kor in, idi ewan (ji gazi kirina pexemberan) tu hisi hilnadin
